name: Witchcatf
description:
The undead have risen, and it's up to you to stop them! Using your trusty potion gun, and your cult of cats, send the undead back where they came from! Unlock upgrades and maximize your damage while you experiment with different potion types.

Made in 5 days for October T-Shirt Jam

Music from Jukedeck - create your own at http://jukedeck.com
